---
title: generate_occ_grp_var
description: |
  Generate an occupation group variable in ACS or CPS microdata.
categories: ["ACS and CPS microdata utilities"]
---

## Description

`generate_occ_grp_var` generates a categorical variable for major occupation groups representing 2-digit [2018 Standard Occupational Classification System (SOC) codes](https://www.bls.gov/soc/2018/major_groups.htm).

For ACS microdata, the variable `occp` must exist. For CPS microdata, the variable `peioocc` must exist.

::: callout-caution
Not all ACS or CPS data years use the 2018 SOC. This command will not work properly for data years that use other SOC versions.
:::

## Syntax

``` stata
generate_occ_grp_var newvar, dataset(acs|cps) [options]
```

| Options           | Description                                                   |
|--------------------|----------------------------------------------------|
| `dataset(string)` | The type of dataset in memory; ACS or CPS (case insensitive). |
| `nolabel`         | Do not assign value labels to *newvar*.                       |
